description.narrative:
Project Outcomes: The Project Outcomes rating is Very Strong with Medium Likelihood of achievement. The most significant expected Project-level Outcomes are derived from increased access to high-speed broadband networks by enabling the connection of a significant number of mobile broadband users to antennas with fiber optic transmission lines, and directly connecting additional households to fiber broadband internet at home, including subscribers in underserved areas with no access to fixed broadband, thereby enabling digital inclusion and improving the quality of internet access for individuals. This network expansion has the potential to drive higher usage of digital connectivity and services by individuals, businesses and government as data-intensive contents like video streaming, conferencing and calls are becoming increasingly central to online interactions.
Market Creation: The Contribution to Market Creation rating is Moderate with Medium Likelihood of achievement. The Contribution to Market Creation is derived from increased competitiveness of the broadband sector, as the investment will support a company in a market with a limited number of large private sector providers and significantly deepen the high-speed internet access segment via competition channels.
The Project has an Anticipated Impact Measurement and Monitoring (AIMM) rating of Good.

With a domestic fiber network of approximately 3,500 km, ElCat LLC ("ElCat" or the "Company") is the largest privately owned, wholesale broadband operator in the Kyrgyz Republic. Using the latest technologies, ElCat has been able to develop a quality network in line with industry standards. It is now seeking $3.0 million from IFC to extend the reach of this network and expand its service offerings (the "Project").
